code: @Override protected Endpoint createEndpoint(String uri, String remaining, Map<String, Object> parameters) throws Exception {     RestApiEndpoint answer = new RestApiEndpoint(uri, this).     answer.setPath(remaining).     setProperties(answer, parameters).     answer.setParameters(parameters).     // if no explicit component name was given, then fallback and use default configured component name     if (answer.getComponentName() == null && getCamelContext().getRestConfiguration() != null) {         answer.setComponentName(getCamelContext().getRestConfiguration().getComponent()).     }     return answer. }
